channel.title: Got a dev buddy sick & tired of bad options for clients?
channel.description:
👋🏾 Hi folks, I'm Helen an ex-front-end developer, 2x startup founder who's focused on helping dev shops and agencies with their business development. Would someone introduce me to a friend/colleague who manages a 2-5 person dev shop? Like to chat about their challenges w/ getting projects and clients that fit their skills, values, and team culture. Looking to help folks out.
Here's my quick pitch... <still a wip> 👇🏾 Tired of last-minute clients and projects being your only options? Fulfilling projects are what software dev shops, consultancies & agencies need. I'm hustling to build client relations that align with your success. Tag-team w/ my Midwest grit to get shit done. 😉
Schedule a call - https://app.hubspot.com/meetings/helen40 Connect or Introduce me - https://www.linkedin.com/in/hgriffinjr/ WIP - http://envoydeals.com/
Welcome any and all advice! Thanks y'all!

Hi folks, I’m Helen an ex-front-end developer, 2x startup founder who’s focused on helping dev shops and agencies with their business development.
